articles.description: Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy announced that the state government will extend 25 lakh cash and a monthly pension of 25,000 to the Padma award winners from Telangana. The decision was made considering the dire economic conditions faced by some of the awardees.
articles.content: 10 tested and tried tips to foster obedient children

articles.author: etimes.in
articles.title: Bigg Boss 17: Samarth Jurel and Tehelka bhai aka Sunny Arya reunite with Arun Mahshettey for his grand fa - Times of India
articles.description: Arun Mashettey and Sunny Arya recently teamed forces to attend the 'Grand Fan Meet-Up' event in Hyderabad. Samarth Jurel also joined the duo.
